text: @Yamiche @JuliaDavisNews But that's where he's going to go since he's already decided to push everyone to open up again. Downplay the fact that Covid-19 is a new coronavirus (no history) and an altogether different kind of virus than the influenza virus. Apples & oranges. It doesn't matter to him.
